suppress.notes: File name: spring-web-5.3.22.jar Suppressed for 6 months A JIRA ticket has been created to track this vulnerability - https://companieshouse.atlassian.net/browse/BI-11675 It is unlikely that this library will be updated and therefore that the suppression will be removed.

File name: jackson-databind-2.15.2.jar Currently this is the latest version of jackson-databind. It has been flagged as a medium vulnerability but this has been disputed by the vendor who states this is not an issue and cannot be taken advantage of by external attackers.
